thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: Tracy Litzenberger

author: Tracy Litzenberger
title: Tracy Litzenberger
text: I've been with Fabletics for about two years. Their leggings are my favorite and my daughter loves them as well. I'd love more long shirts for yoga that are not open everywhere including back and sides. I appreciate coverage and style especially since I'm an XL but jog, hike, walk, and do yoga very regularly. Also, their customer service is amazing.
